article: A traveler hurried down to the hall of an American hotel and went to the cash - desk . He had just 15 minutes to pay his bill and get to the station . Suddenly he remembered that he had left something in his room . " Look here , boy , " he said to the bellboy , " run up to my room and see if I have left a parcel on the table there . Be quick about it . " The boy ran upstairs . Five minutes passed . The traveler was walking up and down the hall , looking very angry . At last the boy appeared . " Yes , sir , " he reported to the traveler , " you have left the parcel there , it ' s right on the table in your room . "

model: went to the front of the hotel
went down to the hall then
came down to the hall but brought nothing back
human: reported to the traveler in the room
came down to the hall but brought nothing back
